edu.rosehulman.soar.editor.soar
Class SoarCodeScanner

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.rosehulman.soar.editor.soar.SoarCodeScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITokenScanner
public class SoarCodeScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITokenScanner

The SoarCodeScanner finds keywords and other attributes in a Soar code document as it is edited by the user. It makes use of the Soar parsing code of VisualSoar, written by Brad Jones using JavaCC and compiled into Java classes which have now been included in the edu.rosehulman.soar.editor tree.

Author:
Zach Lute

Constructor Summary
SoarCodeScanner()
          Creates a code scanner which uses the Soar parsing implementaion provided by Brad Jones in VisualSoar to create Eclipse-style tokens, which can be used to manipulate the document.
